item.title: Dust Storm Turns Australian Skies Orange
item.description: A dust storm this week turned the skies in South Australia a hazy orange, reducing visibility and prompting health warnings.

item.title: U.N. Condemns Israel’s New Aid Program in Gaza, After Chaotic Start

item.title: Joël Le Scouarnec, French Doctor Who Molested Hundreds of Children, Is Sentenced
item.description: A former surgeon had confessed to abusing at least 299 people, mostly children, in what is considered the largest case of its kind in French history.
